chart.name: chart.ticket.no.of.solved.my.ticket
chart.title: My tickets
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_row, (CASE WHEN(translation.message_value = '' OR translation.message_value IS NULL) THEN 'ALL' ELSE translation.message_value END) as _status FROM helpdesk_ticket LEFT JOIN meta_translation as translation ON translation.message_key = 'ALL' AND translation.language = :_language WHERE DATE(created_on) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND assigned_to_user = :_user_id GROUP BY translation.message_value UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_row, (CASE WHEN(translation.message_value = '' OR translation.message_value IS NULL) THEN 'Resolved' ELSE translation.message_value END) as _status FROM helpdesk_ticket LEFT JOIN meta_translation as translation ON translation.message_key = 'chart.resolved' AND translation.language = :_language WHERE DATE(created_on) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND assigned_to_user = :_user_id AND status_select = 2 GROUP BY translation.message_value

chart.name: chart.ticket.no.of.solved.my.team.ticket
chart.title: My team tickets
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_row, (CASE WHEN(translation.message_value = '' OR translation.message_value IS NULL) THEN 'ALL' ELSE translation.message_value END) as _status FROM helpdesk_ticket AS self JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :_user_id JOIN team_team AS _team ON _user.active_team = _team.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation as translation ON translation.message_key = 'ALL' AND translation.language = :_language WHERE DATE(self.created_on) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND _team.id = :_myActiveTeam GROUP BY translation.message_value UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_row, (CASE WHEN(translation.message_value = '' OR translation.message_value IS NULL) THEN 'Resolved' ELSE translation.message_value END) as _status FROM helpdesk_ticket AS _ticket JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :_user_id JOIN team_team AS _team ON _user.active_team = _team.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation as translation ON translation.message_key = 'chart.resolved' AND translation.language = :_language WHERE DATE(_ticket.created_on) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND _team.id = :_myActiveTeam AND _ticket.status_select = 2 GROUP BY translation.message_value

chart.name: chart.SLA.percentage.ticket.solved.not.solved.in.time.per.SLA.per.team
chart.title: Percentage of tickets per SLA & per team
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) * 100 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM helpdesk_ticket) AS _percentage, (CASE WHEN(translation.message_value = '' OR translation.message_value IS NULL) THEN 'Solved' ELSE translation.message_value END) AS _status FROM helpdesk_ticket AS _ticket1 JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = _ticket1.assigned_to_user JOIN team_team AS _team ON _team.id = _user.active_team JOIN helpdesk_sla AS _sla ON _sla.id = _ticket1.sla_policy LEFT JOIN meta_translation as translation ON translation.message_key = 'Solved' AND translation.language = :_language WHERE _ticket1.is_sla_completed = true AND _sla.id = :sla AND _team.id = _sla.team GROUP BY translation.message_value UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) * 100 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM helpdesk_ticket) AS _percentage, (CASE WHEN(translation.message_value = '' OR translation.message_value IS NULL) THEN 'Unsolved' ELSE translation.message_value END) AS _status FROM helpdesk_ticket AS _ticket1 JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = _ticket1.assigned_to_user JOIN team_team AS _team ON _team.id = _user.active_team JOIN helpdesk_sla AS _sla ON _sla.id = _ticket1.sla_policy LEFT JOIN meta_translation as translation ON translation.message_key = 'Unsolved' AND translation.language = :_language WHERE _ticket1.is_sla_completed = false AND _sla.id = :sla AND _team.id = _sla.team GROUP BY translation.message_value

chart.name: chart.ticket.type.percentage.repartition.ticket.per.state
chart.title: Percentage of repartition tickets per state
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) * 100. / (SELECT COUNT(self2.id) FROM Ticket self2 WHERE self2.ticketType.id = :id) AS _percentage, CASE self.statusSelect WHEN 0 THEN 'New' WHEN 1 THEN 'In progress' WHEN 2 THEN 'Resolved' ELSE 'Closed' END AS _status FROM Ticket self WHERE self.ticketType = :id GROUP BY self.statusSelect ORDER BY self.statusSelect
